name: @stonecypher/hsluv.ts
description: A reimplementation of hsluv in typescript

scripts.docs: typedoc --out docs/docs --exclude src/ts/testdata.ts src/ts && touch docs/.nojekyll && cd docs && mkdir badges && cd docs && mkdir badges && cd .. && cd .. &&  cp -r badges/* docs/badges/ && cp -r badges/* docs/docs/badges/
scripts.site: cp ./README.md docs/ && cp ./*.png docs/ && cp ./*.png docs/docs/ && npm run markdown && cp node_modules/markdown-it-highlight/dist/index.css docs/highlight.css
scripts.clean: rimraf -f dist/ && rimraf -f docs/ && rimraf -f badges/ && mkdir badges
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run typescript && npm run test && npm run rollup && npm run terser && npm run badges && npm run docs && npm run site

author: John Haugeland <stonecypher@gmail.com>
